title: Ryan And Shane New Ghost Hunting Show - Ghost Files Teaser
author: Watcher
description:
Introducing Ryan and Shane’s new ghost hunting show, only on Watcher. The hunt begins in 2022.

Bloopers! Behind the scenes looks! Other exclusive content available at
http://www.patreon.com/watcher
Get Watcher merch at http://www.watcherstore.com

Hosts - Ryan Bergara & Shane Madej
Editor - Anthony Frederick
Assistant Director - TJ Marchbank
Camera Operator - Mark Celestino
Sound - Brittney Lee
PA - Carter Lau
Production Coordinator - Brittney Lee
Senior Creative Producer - Annie Jeong
Head of Development - Katie LeBlanc
Production Manager - Nicole Beaudoin
Creative Director of Post Production - Anthony Frederick
Executive Producers - Steven Lim, Ryan Bergara, Shane Madej
Music Provided by Audio Network
